description: The Phantom of the Opera or under its original title Le Fantome de l'Opera, is a novel by French writer Gaston Leroux. First published in 1911, the book initially met with weak reviews but after the popularization of Andrew Lloyd Webber's adaptation to a Broadway musical the story gained much needed attention. The plot follows a man named Erik, an eccentric, physically deformed genius who terrorizes the Opera Garnier in Paris. He builds his home beneath it and takes the love of his life, a beautiful soprano, under his wing. To find out more and have access to this classic masterpiece download our ebook today!
